pages.text: The focus of mana will greatly increase the maximum mana of the wearer, but decrease their mana regen by some amount too. If the wearer's normal regen is too low, they may find themselves loosing mana, so be sure to use some other equipment too.
The focus of regen will greatly increase the mana regen rate of the wearer, but decrease their max mana a bit.
The focus of alchemy will buff certain spells from the school of alchemy, such as lead skin, transmute, and diamond. Has a small boost and regen penalty.
